title: Lioness Season 2: How Many Episodes Are Left? Release Schedule Explained
description: Season 2 of the much-anticipated spy thriller series Lioness has finally arrived on Paramount Plus. The show follows CIA operative Joe, as she juggles her personal and professional life while being at the forefront of the agency’s fight against terrorism. Now, fans are buzzing with questions about how many episodes are in Special Ops: Lioness […] The post Lioness Season 2: How Many Episodes Are Left? Release Schedule Explained appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Fans are eager to learn how many episodes remain in Lioness Season 2 and where to watch them. Here are all the release schedule details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Season 2 of the much-anticipated spy thriller series Lioness has finally arrived on Paramount Plus. The show follows CIA operative Joe, as she juggles her personal and professional life while being at the forefront of the agency’s fight against terrorism. Now, fans are buzzing with questions about how many episodes are in Special Ops: Lioness Season 2, how many are still left to air, and where to watch them. Without further delay, let’s dive into the release schedule for the second season of Lioness as well as the streaming details.. How many episodes of Lioness Season 2 are left after Episode 2? Following the release of Episodes 1 and 2, six episodes remain in Lioness Season 2. Season 2 premiered its two initial episodes together on Paramount Plus. The sophomore season features a total of eight episodes, with the first two having dropped on Sunday, October 27, 2024, at 12 A.M. PT/3 A.M. ET. Now, the remaining six episodes will roll out weekly until wrapping up on December 8, 2024. Check out the episode list below: Episode 1: Beware the Old Soldier (aired on October 27, 2024) Episode 2: I Love My Country (aired on October 27, 2024) Episode 3: Along Came a Spider (airs on November 3, 2024) Episode 4: Five Hundred Children (airs on November 10, 2024) Episode 5: Shatter the Moon (airs on November 17, 2024) Episode 6: 2831 (airs on November 24, 2024) Episode 7: The Devil Has Aces (airs on December 1, 2024) Episode 8: The Compass Points Home (airs on December 8, 2024) Where to watch Lioness Season 2 episodes You can watch all 8 episodes of Lioness Season 2 on Paramount Plus. While the first two episodes have already been released, you can catch new episodes every Sunday till December 8. Creator Taylor Sheridan’s Special Ops: Lioness Season 2 dropped on October 27, 2024. The show dives into the world of Joe, who heads up undercover CIA missions in the fight against terrorism, bringing in female operatives known as Lionesses. So far, the show has received a great reaction from viewers. According to Deadline, Season 1 of Lioness broke records as the most-watched series premiere on launch day for Paramount Plus, racking up almost 6 million viewers in its first week worldwide and during a linear preview on the Paramount Network. The cast of Lioness Season 2 features Zoe Saldaña, Nicole Kidman, Morgan Freeman, Genesis Rodriguez, Dave Annable, and Jill Wagner. Moreover, LaMonica Garrett, James Jordan, Austin Hébert, Jonah Wharton, Hannah Love Lanier, Thad Luckinbill, and Michael Kelly appear in pivotal roles.
html:
Season 2 of the much-anticipated spy thriller series Lioness has finally arrived on Paramount Plus. The show follows CIA operative Joe, as she juggles her personal and professional life while being at the forefront of the agency’s fight against terrorism. Now, fans are buzzing with questions about how many episodes are in Special Ops: Lioness Season 2, how many are still left to air, and where to watch them.

Without further delay, let’s dive into the release schedule for the second season of Lioness as well as the streaming details..

How many episodes of Lioness Season 2 are left after Episode 2?

Following the release of Episodes 1 and 2, six episodes remain in Lioness Season 2.

Season 2 premiered its two initial episodes together on Paramount Plus. The sophomore season features a total of eight episodes, with the first two having dropped on Sunday, October 27, 2024, at 12 A.M. PT/3 A.M. ET. Now, the remaining six episodes will roll out weekly until wrapping up on December 8, 2024.

Check out the episode list below:

  • Episode 1: Beware the Old Soldier (aired on October 27, 2024)
  • Episode 2: I Love My Country (aired on October 27, 2024)
  • Episode 3: Along Came a Spider (airs on November 3, 2024)
  • Episode 4: Five Hundred Children (airs on November 10, 2024)
  • Episode 5: Shatter the Moon (airs on November 17, 2024)
  • Episode 6: 2831 (airs on November 24, 2024)
  • Episode 7: The Devil Has Aces (airs on December 1, 2024)
  • Episode 8: The Compass Points Home (airs on December 8, 2024)

Where to watch Lioness Season 2 episodes

You can watch all 8 episodes of Lioness Season 2 on Paramount Plus. While the first two episodes have already been released, you can catch new episodes every Sunday till December 8.

Creator Taylor Sheridan’s Special Ops: Lioness Season 2 dropped on October 27, 2024. The show dives into the world of Joe, who heads up undercover CIA missions in the fight against terrorism, bringing in female operatives known as Lionesses.

So far, the show has received a great reaction from viewers. According to Deadline, Season 1 of Lioness broke records as the most-watched series premiere on launch day for Paramount Plus, racking up almost 6 million viewers in its first week worldwide and during a linear preview on the Paramount Network.

The cast of Lioness Season 2 features Zoe Saldaña, Nicole Kidman, Morgan Freeman, Genesis Rodriguez, Dave Annable, and Jill Wagner. Moreover, LaMonica Garrett, James Jordan, Austin Hébert, Jonah Wharton, Hannah Love Lanier, Thad Luckinbill, and Michael Kelly appear in pivotal roles.
